document.full_text: a travel-weary rory mcilroy pledged to put his final-round collapse at the masters behind him by delivering a strong performance in this week's malaysian open.
document.title: mcilroy vows to bounce back after masters collapse
lines_and_colors: a travel-weary rory mcilroy pledged to put his final-round collapse at the masters behind him by delivering a strong performance in this week's malaysian open.
